prompt: Panel 01 - Courtyard kickoff, STYLE BASE: Consistent characters on-model every panel. Camila (Ecuadorian, fair skin with barely noticeable tan, long dark braid, teal vest with sunflower patch, teal shorts, tan boots, purple backpack, badge Camila). Camilo (Colombian, fair skin, short straight dark hair, green vest with topo patch, khaki pants, tan boots, orange backpack, badge Camilo). Diego (Colombian, lightly brown skin, short curly dark hair, orange vest with compass patch, navy pants, green backpack, badge Diego). Dr. Young Erben cameo: petite Korean ethnicity, lab coat, typically fancy glasses, neat hair. Style: Dora-inspired explorer energy without copying, 2D flat, bright pastel, thick outlines, map stickers/arrows. Speech bubbles English only, short, legible. Scene: Mayo Clinic Jacksonville courtyard, big friendly aorta diagram on easel, all three interns in explorer gear. Speech: Camila "Ready to map Type 2 endoleaks?" Camilo "Let's explore the hidden flow paths!" Diego "Dr. Erben wants clear visuals." Camera medium wide, pastel sky, playful arrows on ground like a treasure map.
alt_text: Courtyard: three Latino research interns in explorer gear near Mayo Clinic, aorta diagram on easel, speech bubbles launching the mission.

prompt: Panel 02 - Goal map: Whiteboard like treasure map showing aneurysm sac and branch arrows; interns pointing with markers. Speech: Diego "Goal: 32 scenes, all clear." Camila "Story must teach by itself." Camilo "Bubbles carry the science." Apply STYLE BASE; include sticky note "English only".
alt_text: Whiteboard treasure map showing aneurysm sac and branch arrows, interns pointing with markers.

prompt: Panel 03 - Define Type 2: Close-up aorta cutaway, sac, lumbar branch feeding retrograde dotted arrow. Speech: Camilo "Type 2 = retrograde inflow from branches." Camila "Not a seal leak; collaterals feed the sac." Apply STYLE BASE; label sac and branch.
alt_text: Aorta cutaway with aneurysm sac and dotted retrograde arrow from lumbar branch explaining Type 2.

prompt: Panel 04 - Flow mechanism: Magnified lumbar artery into sac with swirling flow, spine landmark subtle. Speech: Diego "Lumbar or IMA feed in; pressure keeps perfusion." Camilo "Risk depends on sac growth." Apply STYLE BASE; small map stickers.
alt_text: Magnified lumbar artery feeding sac with swirling flow and spine landmark backdrop.

prompt: Panel 05 - Risk signal: Cartoon sac with measuring tape, green stable vs red >5 mm growth marker. Speech: Camila "Stable sac? We watch." Diego "Growth over 5 mm? We act." Apply STYLE BASE; arrow to >5 mm text.
alt_text: Sac cartoon with measuring tape; green stable vs red >5 mm growth marker.

prompt: Panel 06 - Imaging plan: Friendly CTA scanner with checklist bubbles: arterial phase, delayed phase, find source vessel. Speech: Camilo "CTA arterial plus delayed for slow flow." Camila "We hunt the vessel feeding the sac." Apply STYLE BASE; include labels arterial/delayed.
alt_text: Friendly CTA scanner with checklist bubbles for arterial and delayed phases and source-vessel hunt.

prompt: Panel 07 - CTA frames: Split arterial vs delayed frames; delayed shows brighter blush. Speech: Diego "Delayed blush confirms inflow." Camilo "I compare sac diameters each phase." Apply STYLE BASE; keep same character faces in side margin.
alt_text: Split CTA frames: arterial vs delayed blush, arrows highlighting sac blush.

prompt: Panel 08 - Source vessel hunt: CT slice with colored path tracing lumbar artery into sac, magnifying glass icon. Speech: Camila "Here the lumbar enters—follow the arrow." Diego "Route ready for embolization." Apply STYLE BASE; highlight path.
alt_text: CT slice with colored path tracing lumbar artery into sac, magnifying glass icon.

prompt: Panel 09 - Check-in with Dr. Erben: Hallway video call tablet showing Dr. Young Erben; interns thumbs-up. Speech: Dr. Erben "Show sac trend and vessel map." Camilo "We have the data ready!" Apply STYLE BASE; hospital backdrop.
alt_text: Video call tablet with Dr. Young Erben; interns giving thumbs-up in hallway.

prompt: Panel 10 - Observation path: Green flowchart stable sac → observe → calendar icons; happy sac face. Speech: Camila "Half resolve within six months." Diego "CTA every 3–6 months." Apply STYLE BASE; consistent outfits.
alt_text: Green flowchart: stable sac → observe; calendar icons and happy sac.

prompt: Panel 11 - Intervention path: Red flowchart sac growth → embolization; catheter icon. Speech: Camilo "If it grows over 5 mm, we intervene." Camila "Choose route: transarterial or translumbar." Apply STYLE BASE; map arrows.
alt_text: Red flowchart: sac growth → embolization; catheter icon.

prompt: Panel 12 - Transarterial route: Microcatheter threading into lumbar artery toward sac; coils ready. Speech: Diego "Microcatheter 2.0F through lumbar branch." Camilo "Coils first; glue if flow persists." Apply STYLE BASE; show hand holding catheter.
alt_text: Microcatheter threading into lumbar artery toward sac with coils.

prompt: Panel 13 - Translumbar route: Needle from back into sac under CT guidance with spine backdrop. Speech: Camila "Direct route when arteries are tortuous." Diego "CT guidance keeps us off the nerve root." Apply STYLE BASE; include safety shield.
alt_text: Needle translumbar path into sac under CT guidance with spine backdrop.

prompt: Panel 14 - Novel idea spark: 3D sac model on table, glowing lightbulb, laptops open. Speech: Camilo "What if we time persistent microbubbles?" Camila "We measure blush duration." Apply STYLE BASE; sticky note "pilot idea".
alt_text: 3D sac model on table, glowing lightbulb; interns pointing to idea.

prompt: Panel 15 - Microbubble tracker: CEUS screen with swirling bright bubbles and timer overlay. Speech: Diego "We track wash-in and wash-out seconds." Camilo "Persistence over 60 seconds flags risk." Apply STYLE BASE; timer visible.
alt_text: CEUS screen with bright microbubbles swirling into sac and timer overlay.

prompt: Panel 16 - Dual-phase CTA overlay: Tablet slider merging arterial and delayed frames with colored overlay. Speech: Camila "Fuse phases to pinpoint inflow." Diego "Aim the microcatheter precisely." Apply STYLE BASE; overlay legend.
alt_text: Tablet slider overlaying arterial and delayed CTA frames with colored blush.

prompt: Panel 17 - Pressure monitoring: Sac diagram with pressure gauge dropping after test. Speech: Camilo "Pressure probe inside sac." Camila "Drop means we sealed the inflow." Apply STYLE BASE; gauge label mmHg.
alt_text: Sac diagram with pressure gauge dropping after test.

prompt: Panel 18 - Outcome data wall: Poster with success 70–80%, recurrence 10–20%, chart arrows. Speech: Diego "Selective embolization succeeds 70–80%." Camilo "Recurrence 10–20%; keep surveillance." Apply STYLE BASE; clear numerals.
alt_text: Poster with success rates 70-80% and recurrence 10-20% plus arrows.

prompt: Panel 19 - Patient talk: Counseling room, anatomical model on table. Speech: Camila "Not a stent seal leak—small branches feed it." Diego "Plan: watch; if growth, seal with coils or glue." Apply STYLE BASE; patient listening, calm tone.
alt_text: Counseling room with anatomical model; interns explaining endoleak to patient.

prompt: Panel 20 - Sterile prep: Cath lab cartoon with blue drapes, checklist floating. Speech: Camilo "Checklist: anticoagulation, access, microcatheter." Camila "Keep fluoroscopy dose low." Apply STYLE BASE; drapes and monitor.
alt_text: Cath lab prep scene with blue drapes and floating checklist.

prompt: Panel 21 - Coil deployment: Inside sac view with coils spiraling, flow stops, sparkles. Speech: Diego "Coils until stasis; Onyx if slow trickle remains." Camilo "Final angiogram to confirm." Apply STYLE BASE; consistent gloves/gear.
alt_text: Inside sac view showing coils deployment and flow stasis sparkles.

prompt: Panel 22 - Post-procedure CTA: CTA slice without blush, green check. Speech: Camila "CTA at 6–12 weeks shows no blush." Diego "Diameter stable or smaller." Apply STYLE BASE; clear green check.
alt_text: Post-procedure CTA slice without blush and green checkmark.

prompt: Panel 23 - Pilot study draft: Poster with bullets: CEUS persistence, sac pressure probe, overlay tool. Speech: Camilo "Hypothesis: bubble over 60s predicts expansion." Camila "Test in 20 consecutive patients." Apply STYLE BASE; clipboards.
alt_text: Poster draft listing CEUS persistence, sac pressure probe, overlay tool.

prompt: Panel 24 - Sample size debate: Table with calculator, coffee cups, charts. Speech: Diego "Power 80%, alpha 0.05 needs 34 cases." Camilo "Add buffer for dropouts." Apply STYLE BASE; consistent outfits.
alt_text: Table with calculator, coffee cups, charts for sample size discussion.

prompt: Panel 25 - Ethics reminder: IRB consent form with heart icon. Speech: Camila "Consent must be clear and plain English." Diego "Low risk, potential benefit." Apply STYLE BASE; no bilingual text.
alt_text: IRB consent form with heart icon; plain-English consent reminder.

prompt: Panel 26 - Data capture: Laptop with sac diameter chart, cloud/REDCap icon. Speech: Camilo "Capture diameter, blush time, pressure." Camila "REDCap triggers alerts." Apply STYLE BASE; same character faces.
alt_text: Laptop charting sac diameter with cloud/REDCap icon.

prompt: Panel 27 - Result teaser: Poster comparing growth vs stable lines, bubbles labeled fast vs slow wash-out. Speech: Diego "If slow wash-out correlates, we change the algorithm." Camilo "Intervene earlier in high risk." Apply STYLE BASE; chart arrows.
alt_text: Poster comparing growth vs stable lines with bubble labels for wash-out speed.

prompt: Panel 28 - Teaching moment: Whiteboard bullets “locate, measure, choose route” all in English. Speech: Camila "Three steps: locate, measure, route." Diego "Always check the delayed phase." Apply STYLE BASE; explorer stickers.
alt_text: Whiteboard bullets “locate, measure, route” for teaching moment.

prompt: Panel 29 - Future tech dream: Augmented reality tablet projecting holographic artery over abdomen. Speech: Camilo "Dream: AR shows the culprit artery." Camila "Guides the microcatheter like GPS." Apply STYLE BASE; keep outfits same.
alt_text: Augmented reality tablet projecting holographic artery over abdomen.

prompt: Panel 30 - Wrap-up with Dr. Erben: Conference room, poster presentation. Speech: Dr. Erben "Clear, visual science wins." Diego "Ready to enroll and publish." Apply STYLE BASE; consistent models.
alt_text: Conference room poster presentation with Dr. Erben; stickers and charts.

prompt: Panel 31 - Patient success: Follow-up visit, happy patient with cane, sac diagram shrinking. Speech: Camila "Sac 5 mm smaller, no blush." Camilo "Annual follow-up set." Apply STYLE BASE; hospital room.
alt_text: Follow-up visit with happy patient using cane; shrinking sac diagram.

prompt: Panel 32 - Future paper: Journal cover mock “Type 2 Endoleak Flow Dynamics”, confetti. Speech: Diego "Submitting cohort with CEUS metrics." Camila "Sharing 3D models and code." Apply STYLE BASE; celebratory stickers.
alt_text: Mock journal cover “Type 2 Endoleak Flow Dynamics” with confetti.
